body:
Overview

Skillup is a program initiated by HackerRank to provide post-hire solutions to companies and enables developers to test and evolve their skillsets. A company will be able to access all the skill level data of their employees in one place. The employees can take skill assessments to develop their skills and grab company opportunities that align with their skill set.  

Use cases for Skillup 

Skillup program is in its initial stage, and as we advance, it envisions providing the below solutions: 

  • Workforce Planning: Enable the companies to understand the skills distribution in the organization to make strategic workforce planning.
  • Credentialing: Enable the employees to develop the skills an organization needs and engage employees in active development by issuing badges for their skill level achievements.  
  • Upskilling: Provide a personalized learning experience at the developer level based on their skills. Developers can look for the skills needed.  
  • Internal Mobility: Developers can access internal opportunities based on skills and plan their careers by learning and advancing in the skills required in the organization. 

Accessing SkillUp

Note: As of now, the Skillup account will be activated by the backend team of HackerRank. There is no signup needed. 

As part of the initial release, employers can access their employer portal to access the skill level data in their organization. 

Soon, an employee portal will be launched to help the employees Skillup.  

Employer Portal

This portal is designed for employers to access all the skill-level data in their organization in one place.  

Overview

When you log in to your Skillup account, you see the overview of your company’s skill distribution. 

The main  components of the Overview page are:

  • Skills Overview: Here, you can see a graphical illustration of the skills available in your company. You can hover your mouse over each skill bubble to see how many employees possess that skill and their level. You can use the filter at the top right to access the data at different proficiency levels. 
  • Skill Distribution: In this section, all skills available in your organization will be displayed, and the employees associated with those skills will be distributed based on their skill level. There are four levels for each skill:
    • Pre-beginner
    • Beginner
    • Intermediate
    • Expert
  • You can click on any skill and see the organization-level insights for that particular skill.

  • You can select the names from the available employees for your desired proficiency and send them the invitation to skill assessments by clicking Send Invites.  

Note: Skill Assessments is an upcoming feature. We will notify you when it is available. 

Talent Directory

The talent directory organizes every individual based on their skill proficiency. It helps you identify the individuals who best match a particular skill you seek. 

  • The Skill and Proficiency filters are available on the left pane of the page.  You can select any skill and proficiency. The directory will filter the candidates who best match your choice. 
  • You can export this data by clicking the Export button at the top. 
  • You can also use the search bar to look for an employee or a role.

Skill Profile

The skill profile is an Individuals skills resume comprising their skill ratings, badges and progress over time. You can click on an employee's name from the talent directory to access their skill profile.  

The skill profile provides an in-depth analysis of an employee's progress in a particular skill. The skill profile page lists the number of skills an employee possesses, their rating, and their progress in the last three months in each skill. 

Note: The Skill Rating is a composite score that considers both the level of proficiency of the questions and the user's performance on those questions in assessments.

On the right pane of the profile, you can see the skill distribution graph and the badges earned by the candidate. 

You can also access the assessment history of the employee and download their skill profile.
